Text.Page:
I've got enough orders to keep handing out for days, .

Next up, looks like they need you to take care of the {@LinkCreature:20#30114001#ossugon centurions}, {@LinkCreature:20#30114002#ossugon prefects}, and {@LinkCreature:20#30114003#ossugon primuses}. They'll be in the Halls of Shadow blocking the path to the lowest level.

Meet up with Pelsus when you're done. He's on...let's see...yep, the Halls of Gloom.

Good work! Love to see our soldiers so eager to get moving!

Here's your reward.
